page.title: 02Houses in Upperton
page.content: Upperton contains a variety of houses. There are bungalows, terraced houses, detatched and semi-detatched houses, of various ages and styles. Most have good sized gardens. The houses follow the line of the road and are surounded by farm land. Most of the houses are made out of brick but some are thatched cottages with stone walls. There is a row of terraced brick houses, called windows Row.In the centre of this row of houses there is a plaque with the date of 1901 on it. However, the houses were built earlier than this, as 1901 was the date when the houses were repaired. Some of these little houses only had an indooor water supply installed about five years ago.
